Package de.tum.cit.fop.maze

Class MasteryManager

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.MasteryManager
public class MasteryManager extends Object
Manages the permanent progression system (skill tree) that persists across game sessions. Players earn XP by defeating enemies and collecting powerups, which converts to skill points. Skill points can be spent to unlock permanent upgrades in four categories: - Speed: Movement speed and stamina improvements - Dash: Dash ability cooldown reduction and invincibility - Attack: Attack speed and damage improvements - Health: Maximum health increases

Each category has 4 tiers of upgrades that must be unlocked in order. All progression is automatically saved to disk and persists between game sessions.

XP System: - 100 XP = 1 skill point - ChickenJockey: 5 XP - NormalEnemy: 10 XP - BigEnemy: 20 XP - powerups: 5 XP

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static MasteryManager getInstance()
      Gets the singleton instance of the MasteryManager. Creates it on first call (lazy initialization).
      Returns:
      the singleton instance

    • addExperience

      public boolean addExperience(int amount)
      Adds experience points to the player's total. Every 100 XP grants 1 skill point. Can grant multiple skill points if enough XP is added at once.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of XP to add
      Returns:
      true if the player earned at least one skill point, false otherwise

    • unlockUpgrade

      public boolean unlockUpgrade(String key, int cost, String previousKey)
      Attempts to unlock an upgrade in the skill tree. Checks if the player has enough skill points and if prerequisite upgrades are unlocked. Automatically saves on success.
      Parameters:
      key - the upgrade key to unlock (e.g., SPEED_1, DASH_2)
      cost - how many skill points this upgrade costs
      previousKey - the prerequisite upgrade that must be unlocked first (null for tier 1)
      Returns:
      true if the upgrade was successfully unlocked, false otherwise

    • hasUpgrade

      public boolean hasUpgrade(String key)
      Checks if a specific upgrade has been unlocked.
      Parameters:
      key - the upgrade key to check (e.g., SPEED_1, DASH_2)
      Returns:
      true if the upgrade is unlocked, false otherwise

    • getSkillPoints

      public int getSkillPoints()
      Gets the number of unspent skill points the player currently has.
      Returns:
      available skill points

    • getExperience

      public int getExperience()
      Gets the current XP progress toward the next skill point.
      Returns:
      current XP (0-99)
